SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class SDKClient.SDKIndicesClient

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.SDKClient.SDKIndicesClient
Enclosing class:
SDKClient
public static class SDKClient.SDKIndicesClient extends Object
Wraps an internal IndicesClient, providing a drop-in replacement in existing plugins with a minimum of code changes.

Do not use this client for new development.
